TopicTitle: Kommunity Guidance Bureau - Moderator Recruitment Open

Articles.Content:
[TABLE=width: 100%, align: center]

[TR]

[TD]

[/TD]

[TD]

Glorious Kommunity!

We are in need of new members to help with growing Kommunity.

Will you help build Glorious Kommunity Comrade?

First Rule of KGB

There is no KGB! Glorious Leader, Comrade Harvester, has made Magnificent Kerbal Kommunity! KGB Must have Feather hand!

Second Rule of KGB

All KGB Comrade's must be willing to dedicate time and energy to helping Glorious Kerbal Kommunity grow and remain safe place for all!

Third Rule of KGB

All Members of KGB must be Adult Comrades (18 and up).

Will you Join KGB and help Magnificent Kommunity grow?

Will you Join KGB for Glorious Leader?

If so,

Please contact Comrade Damion Rayne with application!

All hail Glorious Leader!

[/TD]

[/TR]

[/TABLE]

Note: Poster created by Sordid and used with Permission. Copyright Sordid 2012

Edited August 6, 2012 by Damion Rayne
typo fix
I'm not old enough to be a mod, but I just want to say, this is awesome. Nice work.
Hehe... Honestly, you should have added a Kerbal Space Program, In Soviet Russia joke. Comrade Rayne, let us spread the revolution!
I almost thought he was trolling us... man, that is so unclear. Anyhow, I wish I was old enough for this, now I actually understand what the heck you're on about
I'm also not old enough . I wish I was old enough to do this.
Come Komrades! If you are eligible, you owe it to Mother Kerbin to help us keep this kommunity safe! For the KGB!

All hail mother Kerbin and the radiant Kosmo(kerbo)naut future!

I love it!
That's more like it!
Nova will hunt you down.
*insert stupid soviet joke about the new software here*
Curse you, third rule...

Da, tovarich!

As an eligible old fart (legally speaking), I have an important question:

...what is this?

Da, tovarich!

As an eligible old fart (legally speaking), I have an important question:

...what is this?

Moderator team recruitment I think...

It is indeed joey, the Moderation team is looking for able minded individuals to bolster the forum guard

Edited August 7, 2012 by sal_vager
Exactly what Sal said guys, while this might be some tongue and cheek humor, we are in need of new mods! So apply!

I was confused at first.

Then I was disappointed when you had to be over 18.

But I realized this was a ploy to get you to apply to be a mod, so I am now ambivalent.

If there wasn'T this over 18 part.

Is there some way to become Junior Mod or something? (probably not)
I am over 18 however I doubt I'd be applicable, given my lackluster post count of 1.

Rule 3. I am dissapointed.

Who's to say that there can't be a 14 year old that's as mature as a 18 year old? Seriously.

Rule 3. I am dissapointed.

Who's to say that there can't be a 14 year old that's as mature as a 18 year old? Seriously.

Don't start, this is not my call.

You are quite right, there are some remarkably mature 14-year-olds around. (And I have known some remarkably immature 24-year-olds!)

However, it is extremely hard to distinguish the genuinely mature ones from those who have only a superficial maturity, and if a superficially mature youngster is put in a position of authority AND STRESS then they can become extremely immature very quickly, to their own detriment and that of others. It is best for them (and for the community) if they are protected from that possibility.

Unfortunately, that means the truly mature young adults are forced to demonstrate their maturity by waiting.
I've moderated several forums in the past. But time is a problem... I couldn't watch here all the time.

The age limit has less to do with maturity and more to do with legality.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

I like the poster. Good one Komrade Sordid.

Hey... You didn't use Komrade? Too far?

Rule 3? We are being oppressed, comrades. We must protest in Red Square!

In all seriousness, the age limit is fair enough.
